announcements.message:
Good Morning Team! First of all I just want to welcome all new members to the group. The markets are opening at 5 pm EST today! 📊 As always we will be posting all of our charts in here before the market opens! 🔥 

Tonight we will be having our Sunday Market Blitz which is a live trading session where we cover all of our technical analysis on 10+ pairs. 🎥 

This is an amazing way to kick off the week and see where the each pair could be making their next move. If there are opportunities for entry we will provide them for FREE on this live session 💰

If you aren’t already make sure to join our discord community. Inside of there you can network with other traders 🌍, join our premium services 📈, participate in giveaways 💰and more!  Here is the link to join 🔗 
http://forexleagueteam.com/free
Hey Team! Our live trading session will take place at 8 pm EST! Zoom link will be posted in here before. Talk to you guys soon 🔥

Here is the link to our live trading session you can join NOW 🔗 
 <https://us02web.Zoom.us/j/5273214305>

Thank you for joining our live session! Best of luck this week in the markets.Our next free session will be on Wednesday at 8 am est.  If you want any of our premium services including the Lifetime Course Membership, Premium Signals, and Account Management reach out to us ASAP! https://t.me/forexleaguehelp

Good morning Forex League❗ I want to welcome all our new members to the community! Remember, the morning is the best part of the day to get ahead on your daily habits ☀️ The body is rested, the brain is fresh, and the possibilities of the day are endless. Have an impactful day and feel free to reach out if you have any questions 🙏
If you are not already inside, make sure you join our free course! 🔥 Here is the link to get started! 🔗   http://forexleagueteam.com/free
If you want account management services from us shoot me a message to get more information! ➡️   https://t.me/forexleaguehelp
Here is another free live webinar that you guys can join! Join now 🔗 https://forexleagueteam.com/lifetimelivebroadcast

Good morning Forex League❗We got a new day, new opportunities, and new things to learn.. Let’s get this weeks momentum going 💪  With this group we’re all unstoppable.🙌  If you want any of our premium services including the Lifetime Membership Course, Account Management, or Premium Signals send me a message https://t.me/forexleaguehelp

If you aren’t already make sure to join our discord community. Inside of there you can network with other traders 🌍, join our premium services 📈, participate in giveaways 💰and more!  Here is the link to join 🔗  http://forexleagueteam.com/free
Want us to pass your ftmo challenge for you? We will do it for $100k, $200k and $300k accounts.💰 Should us a message now to get started https://t.me/forexleaguehelp

Hey Team! We are having our only free live trading session of the week tomorrow at 8 am EST. ⏰ A zoom link will be posted here prior to the session and it is completely FREE to join. 

If you have questions about anything feel free to come through and ask in the chat! As always there will be a $25 giveaway for people who attend 💰 See you for tomorrow’s session! 💯

Good morning Forex League❗ Today let’s get one step closer to our goals. Today we will be having our only FREE live session of the week. The link will be dropped in here at 8 am EST. Talk to you soon!🔥
Here is the link to our live trading session you can join NOW 🔗 https://us02web.zoom.us/j/5273214305

Thank you for joining the live session! Our next free session will be the Sunday Market Blitz at 8 pm est. If you want any of our premium services including the Lifetime Course Membership, Premium Signals, and Account Management reach out to us ASAP! https://t.me/forexleaguehelp

Be sure to check out our previously recorded live trading sessions and market lessons completely for free on youtube.💯  We would appreciate it if you subscribed to the channel to help us to continue to grow this community! Here is the link 🔗 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCaghoaCcEoZih60zap3yH5A
Struggling with trading? We can be your Forex mentors just shoot us a message to get started now ➡️   https://t.me/forexleaguehelp
POLL
